General - Line 3 should be marked up like this <:á¼¡Î¼Ì£á¿¶Ì£Î½=PN M. Elmaghrabi (from photo)|ed|á¼¡[Î¼á¿¶]Î½:>. Line 7: <:<#á¼•Î½=1#>=PN M. Elmaghrabi|ed|[á¼•Î½]:>. Reading in line 8 is good. Line 9: this is fine and corresponds with the ed.pr.--thus we regard it as a typo fix. In line 4, Berkes proposes <:á¼¸Ï‰Î¬Î½Î½Ì£Î¿Ì£Ï…Ì£=PN L. Berkes (from photo)|ed|á¼¸Ï‰Î¬Î½[Î½Î¿Ï…]:> Line 10 needs further consideration. Ast and Berkes are going to return to this.
